languages.text: "Благодарность — убогая выдумка. Вольный Торговец мне полез{mf|ен|на}, и {mf|ему|ей} это нравится".
"Gratitude is a pitiful fiction. The Rogue Trader is useful to me, and {mf|he|she} likes it."
languages.original_text: "Благодарность — убогая выдумка. Вольный Торговец мне полез{mf|ен|на}, и {mf|ему|ей} это нравится".

traits.locale_text: "Gratitude is a pitiful fiction. The Rogue Trader is useful to me, and {mf|he|she} likes it."

"Gratitude is a pitiful fiction. The Rogue Trader is useful to me, and {mf|he|she} likes it."
"Gratitude is a pitiful fiction. The Rogue Trader is useful to me, and {mf|he|she} likes it."

languages.text: "Dankbarkeit ist eine erbärmliche Fiktion. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} ist mir nützlich, und es gefällt {mf|ihm|ihr}."
languages.original_text: "Gratitude is a pitiful fiction. The Rogue Trader is useful to me, and {mf|he|she} likes it."

traits.locale_text: "Dankbarkeit ist eine erbärmliche Fiktion. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} ist mir nützlich, und es gefällt {mf|ihm|ihr}."

languages.text: « La gratitude n'est qu'une pitoyable mascarade. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} m'est utile, et {mf|il|elle} aime ça. »
languages.original_text: "Gratitude is a pitiful fiction. The Rogue Trader is useful to me, and {mf|he|she} likes it."

traits.locale_text: « La gratitude n'est qu'une pitoyable mascarade. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} m'est utile, et {mf|il|elle} aime ça. »

languages.text: «La gratitud es un invento lamentable. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente me resulta útil y le gusta serlo».
languages.original_text: "Gratitude is a pitiful fiction. The Rogue Trader is useful to me, and {mf|he|she} likes it."

traits.locale_text: «La gratitud es un invento lamentable. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente me resulta útil y le gusta serlo».

languages.text: 「感謝とは惨めな物語だ。ローグトレーダーは私にとって利用価値がある。{mf|彼|彼女}もそれを好んでいる」
languages.original_text: "Gratitude is a pitiful fiction. The Rogue Trader is useful to me, and {mf|he|she} likes it."

traits.locale_text: 「感謝とは惨めな物語だ。ローグトレーダーは私にとって利用価値がある。{mf|彼|彼女}もそれを好んでいる」

languages.text: “感激不过是可悲的自欺欺人罢了。行商浪人对我很有用，而且{mf|他|她}也很喜欢这样。”
languages.original_text: "Gratitude is a pitiful fiction. The Rogue Trader is useful to me, and {mf|he|she} likes it."

traits.locale_text: “感激不过是可悲的自欺欺人罢了。行商浪人对我很有用，而且{mf|他|她}也很喜欢这样。”

languages.original_text: "Gratitude is a pitiful fiction. The Rogue Trader is useful to me, and {mf|he|she} likes it."

languages.text: "Memnuniyet, acınası bir kurgudur. Hür Tacir benim işime yarıyor ve o da bundan keyif alıyor."
languages.original_text: "Gratitude is a pitiful fiction. The Rogue Trader is useful to me, and {mf|he|she} likes it."
